ValidationRule.description: If Stage is set to Closed Lost then Loss Factors can not be blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "PGi"), $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", CONTAINS(TEXT(StageName), "Closed Lost"), ISBLANK(Loss_Factors__c), $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, $User.ProfileId <> "00ea0000001sYR8", $User.ProfileId <> "00ea0000001sdEo", NOT($Setup.BypassRules__c.Disable_Validation_Rules__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide additional information on why this deal was lost.
